sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import styles from './Users.module.css' let Users = (props) => { props.setUsers([{ id: 1, photoUrl: 'https://oir.mobi/uploads/posts/2021-04/1619541027_32-oir_mobi-p-nyashnie-kotiki-zhivotnie-krasivo-foto-35.jpg', isFollowed: true, fullName: 'Tatiana', status: 'Strong', location: {city: 'Saint-Petersburg', country: 'Russia'} }, { id: 2, photoUrl: 'https://oir.mobi/uploads/posts/2021-04/1619541027_32-oir_mobi-p-nyashnie-kotiki-zhivotnie-krasivo-foto-35.jpg', isFollowed: false, fullName: 'Natalie', status: 'Independent', location: {city: 'Saint-Petersburg', country: 'Russia'} }, { id: 3, photoUrl: 'https://oir.mobi/uploads/posts/2021-04/1619541027_32-oir_mobi-p-nyashnie-kotiki-zhivotnie-krasivo-foto-35.jpg', isFollowed: false, fullName: 'Dora', status: 'Powerful', location: {city: 'Saint-Petersburg', country: 'Russia'} }, { id: 4, photoUrl: 'https://oir.mobi/uploads/posts/2021-04/1619541027_32-oir_mobi-p-nyashnie-kotiki-zhivotnie-krasivo-foto-35.jpg', isFollowed: true, fullName: 'Ola', status: 'Beautiful', location: {city: 'Saint-Petersburg', country: 'Russia'} },]) return
{ props.users.map(u =>
{u.isFollowed ? : }
{u.fullName}
{u.status}
{u.location.country}
{u.location.city}
) }
} export default Users;
